body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for reaching out to Car Excellence. My name is Raymond Wilson and I'll be assisting you today. May I have your name please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Raymond, my name is Judith Cooper.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Judith. Can you please provide me with your phone number for our records?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my phone number is five five five - two two one - three three four four.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you. And could you also share with me your mailing address?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Certainly, my address is eight seven zero Maple Street, Apt two zero one, Lexington, five five five five zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you for providing that information. Is there anything else you would like to share about your experience with us so far?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm feeling sad because my car delivery got delayed.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm truly sorry to hear that. We'll do our best to resolve the issue promptly. Thank you for your patience, Judith.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time today. If you have any further questions, feel free to reach out. Have a great day! Goodbye.
